scripts.start:prod: docker compose -f docker-compose.production.yml pull && docker compose -f docker-compose.production.yml up --build
scripts.publish:server: cd server && docker build -f Dockerfile.production . -t kaitolight/2209-wns-adleman-citycompass-server && docker push kaitolight/2209-wns-adleman-citycompass-server && cd ..
scripts.publish:client: cd client && docker build -f Dockerfile.production -t kaitolight/2209-wns-adleman-citycompass-client . && docker push kaitolight/2209-wns-adleman-citycompass-client && cd ..
